hero.description: RoamJet: Global eSIM for travelers, digital nomads, and backpackers. Buy instant international mobile data plans for 200+ countries. No roaming fees, no physical SIM cards needed. Install travel eSIM online in minutes, activate abroad in seconds. Affordable prepaid data from €3.80/day.

features.title: Connect globally
features.subtitle: Perfect eSIM solution for backpackers, travelers, and digital nomads worldwide

globalCoverage.title: Global Coverage
globalCoverage.description: Stay connected in 200+ countries with our extensive eSIM network coverage worldwide. Perfect for backpackers exploring multiple destinations and digital nomads working remotely.

instantActivation.title: Instant Activation
instantActivation.description: Get connected immediately with our QR code activation. No waiting, no delays. Perfect for travelers who need instant internet access upon arrival.

securePayment.title: Secure Payment
securePayment.description: 256-bit SSL encryption and multiple payment options for your security. Trusted by thousands of travelers and digital nomads worldwide.

deviceCompatibility.title: Device Compatibility
deviceCompatibility.description: Works with all modern smartphones and tablets that support eSIM technology. Compatible with devices used by backpackers and digital nomads globally.

plans.title: Portable Pricing System
plans.subtitle: Best eSIM Plans for Backpackers, Travelers & Digital Nomads
plans.description: Select from our wide range of data plans designed for every type of traveler. Perfect for backpackers exploring multiple countries, business travelers, and digital nomads working remotely. Compare our competitive rates with Airalo and eSIMo.

activation.appAvailable: Our App Available for both iOS and Android devices.
activation.appDescription: Get the most out of your eSIM with our mobile app. Manage your plans, track usage, and get instant support.
activation.appLinksSoon: App store links will be available soon.
activation.followSteps: Follow these simple steps to activate your eSIM and get connected instantly.

step1.title: Purchase Your Plan
step1.description: Choose your destination and data plan. Complete your purchase and receive QR code instantly.

step2.title: Access Device Settings
step2.description:
iOS: Go to Settings → Cellular → Add Cellular Plan
Android: Go to Settings → Network & Internet → Mobile Network → Add Carrier

step3.title: Scan QR Code
step3.description: Use your device camera or photo library to scan the QR code. Your phone will automatically detect and process the eSIM profile.

step4.title: You're Connected!
step4.description: Your eSIM is now active and ready to use. Switch between your plans in your device settings anytime.

footer.companyDescription: RoamJet - Your trusted partner for global eSIM solutions. Perfect for backpackers, travelers, and digital nomads. Compare Airalo vs RoamJet vs eSIMo. Instant activation, worldwide coverage, and secure connectivity for travelers and businesses worldwide.

search.destinationPlaceholder: Search your destination (e.g., France, Germany, United States)
search.typeToSearch: Type at least 2 characters to search

plans.title: eSIM Plans
plans.subtitle: Choose Your Perfect eSIM Plan
plans.description: Browse our selection of eSIM plans from around the world. Instant activation, global coverage, and competitive pricing.
